english-definition: a small stream.
example: He decided to follow a **brook** into the city.

vietnamese-definition: cung cấp, phục vụ tất cả nhu cầu.
english-definition: to provide what is wanted or needed by someone or something.
example: I’ll **cater** to all your needs.

vietnamese-definition: ân cần, chu đáo, tử tế.
english-definition: careful not to cause inconvenience or hurt to others.
example: Elvis’s owner wasn’t a **considerate** person.

vietnamese-definition: việc ăn hoặc uống thứ gì đó.
english-definition: the action of using up a resource, or the amount of something that someone uses, eats, or drinks.
example: There was a heap of tasty bones and bread crusts for **consumption**.

english-definition: a principle or standard by which something may be judged or decided.
example: He possessed all the **criteria** to be a great racing dog.

english-definition: the tough outer part of a loaf of bread.
example: There was a heap of tasty bones and bread **crusts** for consumption.

vietnamese-definition: làm mất phẩm giá, hạ thấp.
english-definition: to treat or regard (someone) with contempt or disrespect.
example: He **degraded** the dog all the time.

english-definition: to give (someone) a legal right or a just claim to receive or do something.
example: You’re **entitled** to a better life than this.

english-definition: to accompany (someone or something) somewhere, especially for protection or security, or as a mark of rank.
example: The woman **escorted** Elvis to a beautiful facility.

english-definition: of or relating to the outside of something.
example: There was a sign on the **external** door that said, “Dogs Welcome!”

vietnamese-definition: cơ sở vật chất, một nơi được xây dựng cho một mục đích cụ thể.
english-definition: a place, amenity, or piece of equipment provided for a particular purpose.
example: The woman escorted Elvis to a beautiful **facility**.

vietnamese-definition: khả năng, năng lực tự nhiên của cơ thể hoặc trí óc.
english-definition: an inherent mental or physical power.
example: His **faculties** were not as strong as they used to be.

english-definition: an untidy collection of things piled up haphazardly.
example: There was a **heap** of tasty bones and bread crusts for consumption.

english-definition: a half of the earth, usually as divided into northern and southern halves by the equator.
example: He was so good that he never lost a race in the northern **hemisphere**.

english-definition: a type of dog used for hunting.
example: He was ready to give up when he heard a soft voice say, “What a beautiful **hound**!”

vietnamese-definition: không thân thiện, không thể hiện cảm xúc cá nhân.
english-definition: not showing personal feelings or warmth; unfriendly.
example: Elvis soon found out that the city was a big and **impersonal** place.

english-definition: an object that is used as a decoration.
example: The interior of the building was painted blue, and shiny **ornaments** hung from the ceiling.

english-definition: a person walking, especially in an area also used by cars.
example: **Pedestrians** yelled at him.

english-definition: a place of refuge or safety.
example: I can take you to a **sanctuary** for old dogs like you.

vietnamese-definition: khán giả, người xem một sự kiện.
english-definition: a person who watches at a show, game, or other event.
example: **Spectators** who bet on dog races always picked Elvis to win.
